alert.note: Alert for Amite; Hancock; Harrison; Jackson; Pearl River; Pike; Walthall; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 08 at 10:56AM CDT until April 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR CRITICAL FIRE CONDITIONS IN SOUTH MISSISSIPPI AND SOUTHEAST LOUISIANA... .The combination of low relative humidity near or below 20 percent and winds of 15 to 20 mph with higher gusts will produce a high fire danger across portions of Mississippi and Louisiana today. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWEST AND COASTAL MISSISSIPPI AND SOUTHEAST LOUISIANA... * AFFECTED AREA...In all of Southeast Louisiana and Coastal and Southwest Mississippi...including Fire Weather Zones 034, 035, 036, 037, 039, 046, 047, 048, 056, 057, 058, 059, 060, 064, 065, 066, 067, 068, 068, 069, 069, 070, 070, 071, 071, 076, 077, 077, 078, 079, 080, 080, 081, 081, 082, 082, 083, 084, 085, 086, 087, 088, 089, and 090... * WIND...Northwesterly winds of 15 to 20 mph with gusts near 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...Relative humidity values at or lower than 20 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Amite; Hancock; Harrison; Jackson; Pearl River; Pike; Walthall; Wilkinson
